mapper.sql: SELECT t1.id, t2.`name` AS category_name, t3.project_name AS project_name, t4.`name` AS knowledge_type_name, t1.question_type, t1.question, t1.attachment, t1.create_user, t1.update_user, t1.create_time, t1.update_time FROM ted_question_bank AS t1 LEFT JOIN ted_category AS t2 ON t1.category_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN ted_project AS t3 ON t1.sub_category_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN ted_knowledge_type AS t4 ON t1.knowledge_type_id = t4.id
mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.question, t1.question_type, t1.attachment, t1.category_id, t1.sub_category_id, t1.knowledge_type_id, t2.name AS category_name, t3.project_name AS project_name, t4.name AS knowledge_type_name FROM ted_question_bank AS t1 LEFT JOIN ted_category AS t2 ON t1.category_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN ted_project AS t3 ON t1.sub_category_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN ted_knowledge_type AS t4 ON t1.knowledge_type_id = t4.id WHERE t1.is_deleted = 0 AND t1.category_id = #{categoryId} AND t1.sub_category_id = #{subCategoryId} AND t1.knowledge_type_id = #{knowledgeTypeId}
